title.native: #コンパス2.0 戦闘摂理解析システム

description:
In the combat providence analysis system, “COMPASS2.0,” heroes gather alongside human partners in a dreamlike space. The heroes have to keep fighting to produce enough energy to keep the system running. One hero named 13 is a troublemaker who refuses to find a partner. When 13 is nearly kicked out, a new player named Jin agrees to join him. Can they bring peace to the world of #COMPASS2.0?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: A new animation project based on the #Compass Sentou Setsuri Kaiseki System game, announced at the sixth #Compass fes.

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Vocal Synth
tags.description: Features one or more singers or characters that are products of a synthesize singing program. Popular examples are Vocaloids, UTAUloids, and CeVIOs.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

title.native: #コンパス 共同生活解析システム

name.native: グスタフ ハイドリヒ

node.description:
__Height:__ 153 cm 

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/NM_NANAPARTY) | [Website](https://www.mizukinana.jp/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/mizukinanaKING) | [Instagram](https://instagram.com/nanamizuki_nm7)

She is admired by many of her fellow actors and fans because of the fact that she has a great amount of power and strength in her singing voice, which surprises many fans due to her regularly petite stature. She was also the winner of the "Best Musical Performance" award in the first Seiyuu Awards. She was also part of the quartet Prits alongside Yumiko Kobayashi, Natsuko Kuwatani, and Hisayo Mochizuki (all four voiced characters in the anime _Sister Princess_). Her singing style comes from singing Enka since she was young.

In July 2020, she married someone from the music industry, and they had their first child on March 16, 2021.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Ittasha in Bakuage Sentai Boonboomger

__Agency:__ Intention

[Website](https://www.uchidayuma.com/) | [Profile](https://intention-k.com/profile/yuma_uchida) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuma_u_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/i_am_yumauchida)

A Japanese voice actor and singer. He made his singing debut in May 2018 under the King Records label. He is [Maaya Uchida](https://anilist.co/staff/108639/)'s younger brother.

His agency announced that he married the voice actress [Rina Hidaka](https://anilist.co/staff/100250) on January 1st, 2024.

__Awards:__
- In 2017, he won Best Male Newcomer at the 11th Seiyuu Awards for his role as [Hayate Immelmann](https://anilist.co/character/90102/).
- In 2019, he won Best Male Lead Actor at the 13th Seiyuu Awards for his role as [Ash Lynx](https://anilist.co/character/13580/).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Kaveh - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Aaron Wei (The Legend of Heroes Series)
- G'raha Tia - Final Fantasy XIV (VG)
-Anaxa - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

__[Website](http://www.hachiojip.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/8_Prince) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/hachiojip) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD7pKXtQ-ZFixYZp8NYAY1Q)__

__HachiojiP__, alternatively known as 8#Prince is a Japanese music producer, lyricist, composer, arranger and DJ.

Affiliated with music production group [Heart's Cry](https://anilist.co/staff/252231/). Previously affiliated with PlatinumGames.

Composer, Arranger, Instrumentalist and Lyricist for:
· Astral Chain, NieR:Automata, Xenoblade Chronicles 2, Bayonetta 2, IDOLM@STER: CINDERELLA GIRLS, CHUNITHM, Deemo 2.0, ARCAEA.
· Kamen Rider, Himouto! Umaru-chan, Ghost in the Shell.
· He started his musical career by making EDM and symphonic metal VOCALOID doujin albums, such as Eschatology, featuring Megurine Luka.
